word:
I am to say to the people of God, Take heed that ye be not deceived. "Seek ye the Lord while He may be found, call ye upon Him while He is near: let the wicked forsake his way, and the unrighteous man his thoughts: and let him return unto the Lord, and He will have mercy upon him; and to our God, for He will abundantly pardon." 
                                   Ellen G. White. 

                                               -
 


                                -326-
